data.title: Big Data Foundation™
data.meta_description: The course provides a base understanding of Big Data, the potential sources of Big Data that can be used for solving real business problems
data.text:
The time is now to develop your skills and improve your capabilities. Use coupon goCCC! for your discount.

CCC certified professionals make an actual difference and help their organizations drive change. They stand out from their peers with verifiable skills and credentials. Get started with our career-changing Big Data Foundation™.

Once you become Big Data Foundation™ certified, you will be able to:

Explain Big Data, its origin, and its characteristics

Discuss the tools applicable to Big Data processing

Explain data mining

Discuss the popular Big Data technologies – Hadoop and MongoDB

Discuss the Big Data projects and the main players involved

Identify and obtain relevant datasets when looking at a business problem

Install and manage Big Data processing environments based on Hadoop or MongoDB at a departmental level

The industry-recognized CCC Big Data Foundation gives learners the opportunity to practice the installation of Hadoop and MongoDB through hands-on lab exercises. The exercises expose you to real-life Big Data technologies with the purpose of obtaining results from real datasets. This practical knowledge is sure to help you jump start your Big Data journey.

Once you become Big Data Foundation™ certified, you will be able to:

Explain Big Data, its origin, and its characteristics

Discuss the tools applicable to Big Data processing

Explain data mining

Discuss the popular Big Data technologies – Hadoop and MongoDB

Discuss the Big Data projects and the main players involved

Identify and obtain relevant datasets when looking at a business problem

Install and manage Big Data processing environments based on Hadoop or MongoDB at a departmental level

Generally, your training partner will book the certification exam for you. If you have chosen an online self-study certification option you will be able to use the voucher provided with the training material.

Certification courses include a mock exam. You can download the mock exam from your dashboard. Free self-study ebooks do not include an exam.

All certificates and badges are issues through Accredible. You will receive an email with your download link in the days following your exam.

No prior knowledge of big data and/or Hadoop is required for this course. Some prior programming experience is a plus, but not necessary.

From postgraduate students to professionals curious about this critical emerging technology. Anybody who is involved with databases, data analysis, wondering how to deal with the mountains of data, this course is made for you.

Well, it will be depending on your rhythm. However, we can tell you that there is 24 hours of content available for this course.

From the moment you have completed the course, you can schedule your exam. Don’t forget that if an exam voucher is included, you are able to schedule your exam for up to twelve months after purchasing the course.

We bet on 100% satisfaction but still, we ensure a 30 days money back guarantee in case we do not live up to your expectations.

Get familiar with all the important digital transformation themes. Understand the bigger-picture aspects of new and emerging technologies and how they can transform any organization.

Verify your skills with industry-recognized certifications. Put the use of new and emerging technologies into perspective, explains their value, and help organizations make the best use of emerging technologies.

Find the job that suits your newly acquired skills set. Stand out with both a digital badge and digital certification. Easily share the verifiable details of your achievements.

Your CCC certification is amongst the highest-rated and sought-after in the industry. Bridge the gap between emerging technologies and business needs.

CCC professionals earn an average of $118,631 per year, outranking other certified professionals, according to the 2019 IT Skills and Salary Report →

The current wave of digital technologies is witnessing change at an unprecedented rate. The opportunity today is to upskill and reskill to gain a significant advantage.
